video_info.title: How To Find Balance | Podcast: Today I'm Growing By Growingannanas
video_info.description:
check out my podcast TODAY I'M GROWING üéôÔ∏èüíñ
https://www.buzzsprout.com/2221807/share

Hey Team! Welcome back to my podcast Today I'm Growing. I'm so excited to have you here!

In today‚Äôs podcast video, I‚Äôm sharing how trying to be perfect left me burned out and how I found a healthier, more balanced way to live. ‚ú® From healing my relationship with food using the 80-20 rule to balancing work and personal life, I‚Äôve got simple, practical tips to help you feel your best. Make sure to watch till the end for all the insights! 

Big hug, Anna xx üå∏
